title: Strengthening Learning Design Competencies: Social Sector Competency Enhancement Program Using Integrated Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational knowledge in social science theories and practical experience
context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners enhance self-directed learning abilities to a performance level of over 80% by progressively utilizing diverse technological tools.
Learners achieve a score of 4 or higher on evaluation criteria by analyzing and integrating multimodal materials (text, video, interactive content).
Learners maintain over 90% participation rates throughout the course by applying flexible time-management strategies.
Learners demonstrate integrated project design competencies for solving social issues at a grade of B or higher in summative assessments.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
